EmailTemplate.name: Public Sector
EmailTemplate.subject: Great to see you at the trade show.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Put our partnership to work for you.
Drive the success of your institution further.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
It was great to see you at the trade show! I wanted to send you a quick note and let you know that as always, Office Depot® is here for you and your agency in every capacity — whenever you need us.
As your partner, you can continue to count on us for the personal attention, dedicated service, leading-edge solutions and competitive pricing your agency deserves.
Office supplies are just the beginning.
In addition to keeping your agency stocked up on what it needs most, you can also count on us for:
· Customized solutions · Multichannel services · World-class support
· Incredible value · 30+ years of expertise · Supply chain success
Experience the Office Depot difference.
Contact me at any time and let me know how Office Depot can help your agency succeed today.
Sincerely, {!User.Name} {!User.TitleTrimmed__c}
{!User.Street} | {!User.City}, {!User.State} {!User.PostalCode} {!if(!ISBLANK(User.My_Customer_Contact__c), 'Tel: '+User.My_Customer_Contact__c,'' )} Email: {!User.Email}
© 2018 Office Depot, Inc. All rights reserved. 6﻿6﻿0﻿0 North Military Trail, Boca Raton, F﻿L﻿ 3﻿3﻿4﻿9﻿6
Have questions? Contact us online or call 888-2-OFFICE (8﻿8﻿8.2﻿6﻿3.3﻿4﻿2﻿3). Privacy Policy
